channel.title: CVE Feed for Veeam -- Backup & Replication
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Veeam -- Backup & Replication

item.title: CVE-2024-29850|2024-07-12T20:28:19.501Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows account takeover via NTLM relay.

item.title: CVE-2024-29849|2024-07-09T21:27:17.792Z -- veeam -- backup%20%26%20replication
item.description: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager allows unauthenticated users to log in as any user to enterprise manager web interface.
